food.name: Pizza
food.description: A savory dish consisting of a round, flattened base of dough topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings.

food.name: Sushi
food.description: A Japanese dish consisting of small balls or rolls of vinegar-flavored cold rice served with a garnish of raw fish, vegetables, or egg.

food.name: Tacos
food.ingredients: Tortilla, Meat (e.g., Beef, Chicken, Pork), Salsa, Lettuce, Cheese
food.description: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients.
